content.html: I *love* coding or reviewing code on trains. The wifi is always crap so it lets you do the deep work without going down search rabbit holes. Trains and crappy wifi are also pretty good for reviewing prose (blog posts, marketing copy, etc.). Maybe I just love trains. ðŸš‚ twitter.com/i/web/status/1â€¦
content.value:
I *love* coding or reviewing code on trains. The wifi is always crap so it lets you do the deep work without going down search rabbit holes.

Trains and crappy wifi are also pretty good for reviewing prose (blog posts, marketing copy, etc.).

Maybe I just love trains. ðŸš‚ twitter.com/i/web/status/1â€¦
